xhtml:div.class: relative flex items-center justify-evenly bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-violet-600 p-8 text-center text-xl font-bold text-white
xhtml:div.style: position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-evenly; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, var(--tw-gradient-stops)); --tw-gradient-from: #2563eb; --tw-gradient-to: #7c3aed; --tw-gradient-stops: var(--tw-gradient-from), var(--tw-gradient-to); padding: 2rem; text-align: center; font-size: 1.25rem; line-height: 1.75rem; font-weight: 700; --tw-text-opacity: 1; color: rgb(255 255 255 / var(--tw-text-opacity));

position: absolute; height: 100%; width: 100%; opacity: 0.5; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); background-position: 0% 0%, 25px 25px, 0px -1px, -1px 0px, -1px 0px; background-repeat: repeat, repeat, repeat, repeat, repeat; background-attachment: scroll, scroll, scroll, scroll, scroll; background-image: radial-gradient(circle, transparent 20%, transparent 20%, transparent 80%, transparent 80%, transparent), radial-gradient(circle, transparent 20%, transparent 20%, transparent 80%, transparent 80%, transparent), linear-gradient(rgb(68, 76, 247) 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(68, 76, 247) 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(68, 76, 247) 1px, transparent 1px); background-origin: padding-box, padding-box, padding-box, padding-box, padding-box; background-clip: border-box, border-box, border-box, border-box, border-box; background-size: 50px 50px, 50px 50px, 25px 25px, 25px 25px;
z-index: 10; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center;

xhtml:h1.class: inline-block bg-gradient-to-r from-gray-100 to-gray-200 bg-clip-text text-9xl text-transparent
xhtml:h1.style: font-size: 8rem; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; display: inline-block; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, var(--tw-gradient-stops)); --tw-gradient-from: #f3f4f6; --tw-gradient-to: #e5e7eb; --tw-gradient-stops: var(--tw-gradient-from), var(--tw-gradient-to); background-clip: text; line-height: 1; color: transparent;

xhtml:div.xhtml:span: Fast âš¡ Dependency free ðŸª¶ Responsive ðŸ¥³

xhtml:div.style: display: flex; gap: 0.5rem; font-weight: 400;

xhtml:div.class: z-10 flex h-200 w-2/5 flex-col-reverse gap-4 rounded-xl border border-slate-600 bg-slate-900 opacity-90 p-4 shadow-2xl backdrop-blur-2xl
xhtml:div.style: z-index: 10; display: flex; flex-direction: column-reverse; gap: 1rem; border-radius: 0.75rem; border-width: 1px; --tw-border-opacity: 1; border-color: rgb(71 85 105 / var(--tw-border-opacity)); --tw-bg-opacity: 1; background-color: rgb(15 23 42 / var(--tw-bg-opacity)); padding: 1rem; opacity: 0.9; --tw-shadow: 0 25px 50px -12px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.25); --tw-shadow-colored: 0 25px 50px -12px var(--tw-shadow-color); box-shadow: var(--tw-ring-offset-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-ring-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-shadow); --tw-backdrop-blur: blur(40px); backdrop-filter: var(--tw-backdrop-blur) var(--tw-backdrop-brightness) var(--tw-backdrop-contrast) var(--tw-backdrop-grayscale) var(--tw-backdrop-hue-rotate) var(--tw-backdrop-invert) var(--tw-backdrop-opacity) var(--tw-backdrop-saturate) var(--tw-backdrop-sepia);

xhtml:div.class: h-20 w-full rounded-xl border border-indigo-600 bg-indigo-900
xhtml:div.style: height: 5rem; width: 100%; border-radius: 0.75rem; border-width: 1px; --tw-border-opacity: 1; border-color: rgb(79 70 229 / var(--tw-border-opacity)); --tw-bg-opacity: 1; background-color: rgb(49 46 129 / var(--tw-bg-opacity));
display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 0.5rem;

xhtml:span.style: align-self: flex-start; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.25rem; font-weight: 400; --tw-text-opacity: 1; color: rgb(226 232 240 / var(--tw-text-opacity));
